LONDON & WROCLAW | Senior iOS Dev, Senior Android Dev, mid weight Android Dev| ONSITE | Full-time | Tigerspike

Hi! We're a global digital products company with 9 offices around the world. We've just been acquired by a large US company which has meant we can grow our mobile team globally.

90% of our work is native mobile, working on large scale global enterprise projects as well as consumer apps. Check us out: www.tigerspike.com

If you'd like more info, just email me @ michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com

Thanks Michelle
